entities.name: dolores umbridge
entities.description: Professor Dolores Umbridge is mentioned as the one who has been giving Harry Potter detention every evening this week.

entities.name: house points
entities.description: House points are mentioned as something that could be lost due to misbehavior in Professor Umbridge's class.

entities.name: detention
entities.description: Detention is mentioned as a consequence of misbehavior in Professor Umbridge's class.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as the one who is speaking to Harry Potter and reminding him that Dolores Umbridge is reporting to someone.

relationships.description: Dolores Umbridge is reporting to Professor McGonagall, as mentioned in the conversation between Harry Potter and Professor McGonagall.
Dolores Umbridge has given detention to Harry Potter every evening this week, as mentioned in the conversation between Harry Potter and Professor McGonagall.
